title: Verizon Media | Yahoo! Home 2.0
body:
**It's official! Oath: has become Verizon Media!** It's time for a facelift. We're doing explorations of new branding and application layout for core pieces of Verizon Media properties including Yahoo! Home and many others.

Images below are examples of some of the explorations prior to the Home 2.0 launch and Yahoo! rebranding.
